div.p: This value set includes all the "Clinical finding" SNOMED CT codes (i.e. codes with an is-a relationship with 91723000: Anatomical structure)
This value set includes codes defined in other code systems, using the following rules:

ul.li: Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 91723000

description.value: This value set includes all the "Clinical finding" SNOMED CT codes (i.e. codes with an is-a relationship with 91723000: Anatomical structure)
